data.name: Super 3D Table Tennis
data.detailed_description: Overview: This game is a school project done by my friend Zak Kasper and I. The game is as it says, Table Tennis (or Ping Pong). The game is VR only. The game is only 3 levels currently and is overall still a work in progress.
data.about_the_game: Overview: This game is a school project done by my friend Zak Kasper and I. The game is as it says, Table Tennis (or Ping Pong). The game is VR only. The game is only 3 levels currently and is overall still a work in progress.
data.short_description: Overview: The game is as it says, Table Tennis (or Ping Pong). The game is VR only.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8.1 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 or better; AMD Ryzen 3 1200 or FX-4350, or better.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 Ti or better; AMD Radeon RX 470 or better.
  • Storage: 143 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8.1 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or better; AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or better.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 or better; AMD Radeon RX 480 or better
  • Storage: 143 MB available space
